panels.title: Overview (updates based on top time selection)

targets.rawSQL:
SELECT
    count(distinct source) as distinct_source
    , sum(sum_bounce) as sum_bounce
    , sum(sum_complaint) as sum_complaint
    , sum(sum_delivery) as sum_delivery
    , sum(sum_send) as sum_send
    , sum(sum_reject) as sum_reject
    , sum(sum_open) as sum_open
    , sum(sum_click) as sum_click
    , sum(sum_failure) as sum_failure
    , sum(sum_delivery_delay) as sum_delivery_delay
    , sum(sum_delivery_delay_internalfailure) as sum_delivery_delay_internalfailure
    , sum(sum_delivery_delay_general) as sum_delivery_delay_general
    , sum(sum_delivery_delay_mailboxfull) as sum_delivery_delay_mailboxfull
    , sum(sum_delivery_delay_spamdetected) as sum_delivery_delay_spamdetected
    , sum(sum_delivery_delay_recipientservererror) as sum_delivery_delay_recipientservererror
    , sum(sum_delivery_delay_ipfailure) as sum_delivery_delay_ipfailure
    , sum(sum_delivery_delay_transientcommunicationfailure) as sum_delivery_delay_transientcommunicationfailure
    , sum(sum_delivery_delay_byoiphostnamelookupunavailable) as sum_delivery_delay_byoiphostnamelookupunavailable
    , sum(sum_delivery_delay_undetermined) as sum_delivery_delay_undetermined
    , sum(sum_delivery_delay_sendingdeferral) as sum_delivery_delay_sendingdeferral
    , sum(sum_subscription) as sum_subscription
FROM "$__table"
WHERE source IN (${source:sqlstring})
    AND subject IN (${subject:sqlstring})
    AND tagId IN (${tagId:sqlstring})
    AND $__unixEpochFilter(time / 1000)
    AND (event_hour BETWEEN  $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMddHH') AND  $__rawTimeTo('yyyyMMddHH')
        OR event_hour = $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMdd00'))

SELECT time
    , sum(t.sum_bounce) as sum_bounce
    , sum(t.sum_complaint) as sum_complaint
    , sum(t.sum_delivery) as sum_delivery
    , sum(t.sum_send) as sum_send
    , sum(t.sum_reject) as sum_reject
    , sum(t.sum_open) as sum_open
    , sum(t.sum_click) as sum_click
    , sum(t.sum_failure) as sum_failure
    , sum(t.sum_delivery_delay) as sum_delivery_delay
    , sum(t.sum_delivery_delay_internalfailure) as sum_delivery_delay_internalfailure
    , sum(t.sum_delivery_delay_general) as sum_delivery_delay_general
    , sum(t.sum_delivery_delay_mailboxfull) as sum_delivery_delay_mailboxfull
    , sum(t.sum_delivery_delay_spamdetected) as sum_delivery_delay_spamdetected
    , sum(t.sum_delivery_delay_recipientservererror) as sum_delivery_delay_recipientservererror
    , sum(t.sum_delivery_delay_ipfailure) as sum_delivery_delay_ipfailure
    , sum(t.sum_delivery_delay_transientcommunicationfailure) as sum_delivery_delay_transientcommunicationfailure
    , sum(t.sum_delivery_delay_byoiphostnamelookupunavailable) as sum_delivery_delay_byoiphostnamelookupunavailable
    , sum(t.sum_delivery_delay_undetermined) as sum_delivery_delay_undetermined
    , sum(t.sum_delivery_delay_sendingdeferral) as sum_delivery_delay_sendingdeferral
    , sum(t.sum_subscription) as sum_subscription
    , sum(t.acc_bounce) as acc_bounce
    , sum(t.acc_complaint) as acc_complaint
    , sum(t.acc_delivery) as acc_delivery
    , sum(t.acc_send) as acc_send
    , sum(t.acc_reject) as acc_reject
    , sum(t.acc_open) as acc_open
    , sum(t.acc_click) as acc_click
    , sum(t.acc_failure) as acc_failure
    , sum(t.acc_delivery_delay) as acc_delivery_delay
    , sum(t.acc_delivery_delay_internalfailure) as acc_delivery_delay_internalfailure
    , sum(t.acc_delivery_delay_general) as acc_delivery_delay_general
    , sum(t.acc_delivery_delay_mailboxfull) as acc_delivery_delay_mailboxfull
    , sum(t.acc_delivery_delay_spamdetected) as acc_delivery_delay_spamdetected
    , sum(t.acc_delivery_delay_recipientservererror) as acc_delivery_delay_recipientservererror
    , sum(t.acc_delivery_delay_ipfailure) as acc_delivery_delay_ipfailure
    , sum(t.acc_delivery_delay_transientcommunicationfailure) as acc_delivery_delay_transientcommunicationfailure
    , sum(t.acc_delivery_delay_byoiphostnamelookupunavailable) as acc_delivery_delay_byoiphostnamelookupunavailable
    , sum(t.acc_delivery_delay_undetermined) as acc_delivery_delay_undetermined
    , sum(t.acc_delivery_delay_sendingdeferral) as acc_delivery_delay_sendingdeferral
    , sum(t.acc_subscription) as acc_subscription
FROM (SELECT 
        $__unixEpochGroup(time / 1000, '${interval}') as time
        , sum(sum_bounce) over(partition by $__unixEpochGroup(time / 1000, '${interval}') ) as sum_bounce
        , sum(sum_complaint) over(partition by $__unixEpochGroup(time / 1000, '${interval}') ) as sum_complaint
        , sum(sum_delivery) over(partition by $__unixEpochGroup(time / 1000, '${interval}') ) as sum_delivery
        , sum(sum_send) over(partition by $__unixEpochGroup(time / 1000, '${interval}') ) as sum_send
        , sum(sum_reject) over(partition by $__unixEpochGroup(time / 1000, '${interval}') ) as sum_reject
        , sum(sum_open) over(partition by $__unixEpochGroup(time / 1000, '${interval}') ) as sum_open
        , sum(sum_click) over(partition by $__unixEpochGroup(time / 1000, '${interval}') ) as sum_click
        , sum(sum_failure) over(partition by $__unixEpochGroup(time / 1000, '${interval}') ) as sum_failure
        , sum(sum_delivery_delay) over(partition by $__unixEpochGroup(time / 1000, '${interval}') ) as sum_delivery_delay
        , sum(sum_delivery_delay_internalfailure) over(partition by $__unixEpochGroup(time / 1000, '${interval}') ) as sum_delivery_delay_internalfailure
        , sum(sum_delivery_delay_general) over(partition by $__unixEpochGroup(time / 1000, '${interval}') ) as sum_delivery_delay_general
        , sum(sum_delivery_delay_mailboxfull) over(partition by $__unixEpochGroup(time / 1000, '${interval}') ) as sum_delivery_delay_mailboxfull
        , sum(sum_delivery_delay_spamdetected) over(partition by $__unixEpochGroup(time / 1000, '${interval}') ) as sum_delivery_delay_spamdetected
        , sum(sum_delivery_delay_recipientservererror) over(partition by $__unixEpochGroup(time / 1000, '${interval}') ) as sum_delivery_delay_recipientservererror
        , sum(sum_delivery_delay_ipfailure) over(partition by $__unixEpochGroup(time / 1000, '${interval}') ) as sum_delivery_delay_ipfailure
        , sum(sum_delivery_delay_transientcommunicationfailure) over(partition by $__unixEpochGroup(time / 1000, '${interval}') ) as sum_delivery_delay_transientcommunicationfailure
        , sum(sum_delivery_delay_byoiphostnamelookupunavailable) over(partition by $__unixEpochGroup(time / 1000, '${interval}') ) as sum_delivery_delay_byoiphostnamelookupunavailable
        , sum(sum_delivery_delay_undetermined) over(partition by $__unixEpochGroup(time / 1000, '${interval}') ) as sum_delivery_delay_undetermined
        , sum(sum_delivery_delay_sendingdeferral) over(partition by $__unixEpochGroup(time / 1000, '${interval}') ) as sum_delivery_delay_sendingdeferral
        , sum(sum_subscription) over(partition by $__unixEpochGroup(time / 1000, '${interval}') ) as sum_subscription
        , sum(sum_bounce) over(order by $__unixEpochGroup(time / 1000, '${interval}') asc) as acc_bounce
        , sum(sum_complaint) over(order by $__unixEpochGroup(time / 1000, '${interval}') asc) as acc_complaint
        , sum(sum_delivery) over(order by $__unixEpochGroup(time / 1000, '${interval}') asc) as acc_delivery
        , sum(sum_send) over(order by $__unixEpochGroup(time / 1000, '${interval}') asc) as acc_send
        , sum(sum_reject) over(order by $__unixEpochGroup(time / 1000, '${interval}') asc) as acc_reject
        , sum(sum_open) over(order by $__unixEpochGroup(time / 1000, '${interval}') asc) as acc_open
        , sum(sum_click) over(order by $__unixEpochGroup(time / 1000, '${interval}') asc) as acc_click
        , sum(sum_failure) over(order by $__unixEpochGroup(time / 1000, '${interval}') asc) as acc_failure
        , sum(sum_delivery_delay) over(order by $__unixEpochGroup(time / 1000, '${interval}') asc) as acc_delivery_delay
        , sum(sum_delivery_delay_internalfailure) over(order by $__unixEpochGroup(time / 1000, '${interval}') asc) as acc_delivery_delay_internalfailure
        , sum(sum_delivery_delay_general) over(order by $__unixEpochGroup(time / 1000, '${interval}') asc) as acc_delivery_delay_general
        , sum(sum_delivery_delay_mailboxfull) over(order by $__unixEpochGroup(time / 1000, '${interval}') asc) as acc_delivery_delay_mailboxfull
        , sum(sum_delivery_delay_spamdetected) over(order by $__unixEpochGroup(time / 1000, '${interval}') asc) as acc_delivery_delay_spamdetected
        , sum(sum_delivery_delay_recipientservererror) over(order by $__unixEpochGroup(time / 1000, '${interval}') asc) as acc_delivery_delay_recipientservererror
        , sum(sum_delivery_delay_ipfailure) over(order by $__unixEpochGroup(time / 1000, '${interval}') asc) as acc_delivery_delay_ipfailure
        , sum(sum_delivery_delay_transientcommunicationfailure) over(order by $__unixEpochGroup(time / 1000, '${interval}') asc) as acc_delivery_delay_transientcommunicationfailure
        , sum(sum_delivery_delay_byoiphostnamelookupunavailable) over(order by $__unixEpochGroup(time / 1000, '${interval}') asc) as acc_delivery_delay_byoiphostnamelookupunavailable
        , sum(sum_delivery_delay_undetermined) over(order by $__unixEpochGroup(time / 1000, '${interval}') asc) as acc_delivery_delay_undetermined
        , sum(sum_delivery_delay_sendingdeferral) over(order by $__unixEpochGroup(time / 1000, '${interval}') asc) as acc_delivery_delay_sendingdeferral
        , sum(sum_subscription) over(order by $__unixEpochGroup(time / 1000, '${interval}') asc) as acc_subscription
    FROM "$__table"
    WHERE source IN (${source:sqlstring})
        AND subject IN (${subject:sqlstring})
        AND tagId IN (${tagId:sqlstring})
        AND $__unixEpochFilter(time / 1000)
        AND (event_hour BETWEEN  $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMddHH') AND  $__rawTimeTo('yyyyMMddHH')
            OR event_hour = $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMdd00'))
) t
GROUP BY time

SELECT source
    , sum(sum_send) as sum_send
    , sum(sum_bounce) as sum_bounce
    , sum(sum_complaint) as sum_complaint
    , sum(sum_delivery) as sum_delivery
    , sum(sum_reject) as sum_reject
    , sum(sum_open) as sum_open
    , sum(sum_click) as sum_click
    , sum(sum_failure) as sum_failure
    , sum(sum_delivery_delay) as sum_delivery_delay
    , sum(sum_delivery_delay_internalfailure) as sum_delivery_delay_internalfailure
    , sum(sum_delivery_delay_general) as sum_delivery_delay_general
    , sum(sum_delivery_delay_mailboxfull) as sum_delivery_delay_mailboxfull
    , sum(sum_delivery_delay_spamdetected) as sum_delivery_delay_spamdetected
    , sum(sum_delivery_delay_recipientservererror) as sum_delivery_delay_recipientservererror
    , sum(sum_delivery_delay_ipfailure) as sum_delivery_delay_ipfailure
    , sum(sum_delivery_delay_transientcommunicationfailure) as sum_delivery_delay_transientcommunicationfailure
    , sum(sum_delivery_delay_byoiphostnamelookupunavailable) as sum_delivery_delay_byoiphostnamelookupunavailable
    , sum(sum_delivery_delay_undetermined) as sum_delivery_delay_undetermined
    , sum(sum_delivery_delay_sendingdeferral) as sum_delivery_delay_sendingdeferral
    , sum(sum_subscription) as sum_subscription
FROM "$__table"
WHERE source IN (${source:sqlstring})
    AND subject IN (${subject:sqlstring})
    AND tagId IN (${tagId:sqlstring})
    AND $__unixEpochFilter(time / 1000)
    AND (event_hour BETWEEN  $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMddHH') AND  $__rawTimeTo('yyyyMMddHH')
        OR event_hour = $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMdd00'))
GROUP BY source
HAVING sum(sum_send) > 0

list.allValue: SELECT source FROM "$__table" WHERE event_hour BETWEEN  $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMddHH') AND  $__rawTimeTo('yyyyMMddHH') 	OR event_hour = $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMdd00') GROUP BY source
list.label: Source
list.name: source

query.rawSQL:
SELECT source
FROM "$__table"
WHERE event_hour BETWEEN  $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMddHH') AND  $__rawTimeTo('yyyyMMddHH')
	OR event_hour = $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMdd00')
GROUP BY source

list.allValue: SELECT subject FROM "$__table" WHERE event_hour BETWEEN  $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMddHH') AND  $__rawTimeTo('yyyyMMddHH') 	OR event_hour = $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMdd00') GROUP BY subject
list.label: Subject
list.name: subject

query.rawSQL:
SELECT subject
FROM "$__table"
WHERE event_hour BETWEEN  $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMddHH') AND  $__rawTimeTo('yyyyMMddHH')
	OR event_hour = $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMdd00')
GROUP BY subject

list.allValue: SELECT tagid FROM "$__table" WHERE event_hour BETWEEN  $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMddHH') AND  $__rawTimeTo('yyyyMMddHH') 	OR event_hour = $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMdd00') GROUP BY tagid
list.label: Tag Id
list.name: tagId

query.rawSQL:
SELECT tagid
FROM "$__table"
WHERE event_hour BETWEEN  $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMddHH') AND  $__rawTimeTo('yyyyMMddHH')
	OR event_hour = $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMdd00')
GROUP BY tagid
